Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Heart Disorder/Valvular Heart Disorder/Valvular Stenosis/Pulmonary Stenosis
Record.Description: Narrowing of the opening between the pulmonary artery and the right ventricle, usually at the level of the valve leaflets.
